Language option: Set language for this application. Requires a restart
Got latest backend version available: Successfully got the latest backend version available
Got current backend version: Successfully contacted the backend and got the version used.
Is IP correct: Backend is unreachable. Are the IP and port correct ?
Theme details: Set theme color to dark or light
Close button details: Application will be minimized to system tray when closed
Backend IP details: Set the IP of the backend
Backend protocol details: Protocol to use to reach the backend
Backend Port details: Set the port of the backend
Backend Port placeholder: Must be a port number. Ex: 8080
Backend polling details: Time in seconds between 2 calls to the backend. Used to periodically check the status of the backend
